reviews.text: Two stars at the moment.  Ordered the screens 10 days ago, and nothing has moved on my order.  Can't seem to get a reply via email, online form, or calling them.  If you call they just testily tell you to wait a second and then transfer you to a number that is just a voicemail.  Seems like they're not interested in maintaining contact with people who gave them money which seems odd to me.

Great service (thanks, Amanda!) and excellent quality and workmanship!
This my first effort at screening in a porch and with Amanda's help walking me through the whole process, it came out better than I had hoped it would. Delivered when they promised and packaged VERY well...not a nick or scratch on any of the product being shipped from TX to upstate NY.
If I could give this company 6 stars out of 5, I would!

Extremely slow and lacking good communication. Placed an order several weeks ago, followed up a week later to see when we could expect the order to arrive.

Received a reply the same day saying "Should be no more than week before we ship out."

Wrote back to ask if that meant a week after ordering or a week after that email?

As of writing this review it has been 1.5 weeks since that email -- Never received a reply and never saw the order ship.

(Updated review)
They did reach out to me after posting my initial review, so I will give add a star for that, although I wish they had just replied to my initial email. They said that based on the photos, all screens were made with the solar insect screen material, which is more expensive, so I will also add another star.

That said, I’m still not super impressed with the quality of the screens. Compared with the other ones in my house (which are also basic aluminum frames), this one feels much
Do not order from here. Had the exact same experience as another reviewer. Weeks with no update about an order after multiple calls and emails. Emailed and called to cancel, nothing. It’s a scam

Dear Quality Screen Door Company,

Since I am unable to successfully solve the problem through contacting your customer service department via email, I’d thought it would be able to get an answer this way as well as be able to allow everyone the feedback from the screens for our double French door.

It's been a month since we have installed our screen. The first two weeks the screen closes well and latches without a problem but after that, the screen, when it is unlatched, the screens gets stuck

I ordered some screen frame from this company to repair some bent up insect screens in my home.  I was concerned how the frame stock would be shipped knowing how difficult it would be to keep these delicate 7 foot long pieces from being damaged in shipment.  And by mistake I doubled my order for corners.  So from Monday morning to Tuesday noon these folks straightened out my order, packed my order in an indestructible box, and delivered to my doorstep a thousand miles away.  Top quality, competi

Our experience with Quality Screen has been a disappointment from start to finish.  It took them over a month to process our order.  We had to call them to find out what was going on, and they couldn't find our screen.  After 2 other calls, they found the screen.  When it arrived, there were no directions for installation.  The door latch was too large for the door and my husband had to come up with an alternative method of latching the door.  The door cost over $200 and I feel that we should ha

I purchased numerous sun screen several years ago from Quality Screen; that was an excellent transaction--high quality; reasonable price. When I moved to another house, I order my sun screens also through Quality Screen. This time there was a hick-up in production: actually there were three--the order had to be re-done 2 times after the first production due to manufacturing quality issues. The Customer Service office oversaw the redos until the order was done to the company's high standards. Eve

The entire team at Quality Screen totally exceeded my expectations! I had been looking to buy solar screens for months and was about to give up and "do it myself". I am so grateful I found Quality Screen Co.  They understood my complex requirements, they offered top quality products at competitive prices, and they expedited my shipment, arriving 1 week ahead of schedule!  WOW! Everything I ordered & received was perfect, and looks great and is already helping reduce the heat and glare in my home

We ordered new custom screens of various sizes for a screened in porch.  They were very patient with helping us through the process. Shipping to Maryland took a little while due to Covid but everything arrived in tact.  We messed up one of the screen measurements and they promptly sent us a new one. It was our mistake not theirs.  I will definitely use them again if I have to replace our screens.

Simply outstanding customer Service!  Amanda and crew took such good care of me and even put a rush on my second order when She found out we had a baby on the way and were trying to baby-proof out house!  Completely thrilled and will do business with again and again!

I found qualitywindowscreen.com via Google when we were trying to buy window screens to replace 2 screens that had completely broke. Initially I was a bit hesitant about ordering from a place I've never heard of before, but they really proved themselves through the extremely responsible customer service when the manufacturing was delayed due to Covid-19, and when the product was shipped, I was really impressed with how sturdy the shipment container was. Both screens came out exactly as specified

I needed screen for my patio because our small dogs were tearing up our aluminum screens. I ordered enough screen for the doors facing the back yard (and the west end, a mess of hot afternoon sun) and after installing the new "pet" screen, I ordered more to do the rest of the west side of my house as well. I now have screens that not only hold up to my dogs, but shade the west and south parts of my home as well! It looks great and sure is easier on the air-conditioning!  And I received both ship

The whale of a woman who works in customer service has a terrible attitude and is absolutely worthless when it comes to the word 'service.' She acted like the small order I placed would take them months to fill, when in reality anyone can show up to this tiny dump and pick up their order at will (assuming they ordered it from the supplier). 2 stars for great price, fire the terrible customer service rep & replace with a decent mouth breather and this place is 5* all day.

Stumbled across Quality Screen looking to replace all the screens on my house.  Pricing, quality, delivery and customer service have all been outstanding.   I don't always get this lucky with a new business relationship pulled off the web.  But really glad I found them.

terrible experience.  Ordered 2 patio screens beginning of June.  7-10 day quote on time, that turned into a month.  Received parts damaged.  contacted Cust. Serv. who said they would send out new parts.  After a few weeks i contacted and was told they are busy, order went through.  Waited a few more weeks and got same answer.  finally received new parts today Aug 15-DAMAGED AGAIN.  They do not use any cushioning at the ends of the box and they corners are damaged.  I gave them 1 star so folks w

Eric and his team are true professionals. I had a issue with a recent order and he was willing  to make it right with me! It was partially My fault in the order process.I can’t say how much I appreciate it! You don’t find that every day. Good Ol American company!

Purchased custom fit RollAway 4000 window screen. Excellent service and merchandise. Very friendly assistance to expedite and complete installation and in replacement of small component broken during shipping.
Pleasure to do business with. Thanks again.

We have worked with Eric and his team at Quality Screen Company for several years and they are the one of the most professional and well run organizations that we have dealt with.  Quality Screen Company is a real pleasure to do business with and we would highly recommend them to anyone!
I called multiple times. it rings once and hangs up

I just wanted to let you know that our screens arrived today at 7:30 and I had them installed by 8:30. They are beautiful and fit absolutely perfectly!!! I had to hammer in the pegs so I know that they are not going to fall out and they are nice and snug.

I just got my retractable screen last night. Installation was EXTREMELY easy. I had it installed within 15 minutes with my girlfriend's help. It looks and feels solid. I can't wait for the warmer weather so I can put it to good use.

They do not package them when you pick them up they are stretch wrapped at the top and bottom...but we fixed the ones that had gotten bent and made them work! But all in all we like the idea of just inserting them in the windows for the most part we are very satisfied!
Excellent service and workmanship. My custom screen was packaged very well for shipping. Price was acceptable for quality and fast production. Highly recommended.
Web site is excellent. Email communication regarding order excellent. Phone follow-up confirming a non-standard request on my order - excellent. Phone follow-up when order ready - excellent.

Just wanted to add my thank you to your positive reviews. I was very impressed with your entire process.... from website ordering to receipt of well packaged product.
Your company name speaks for you....thanks again!
Love these people! Amanda and her team have been extremely Helpful!  I will definitely be buying from them again!

I couldn't have asked for better assistance. Eric took the time to walk me through all the things I would need to consider in ordering custom window screens. No matter what I asked he knew the answer and the web site was also extremely informative. I would recommend them to anyone. They are the best!
Placed an online order, which should have shipped in 10 days, now over a month and can't get an answer via email or phone

5 stars! Excellent customer service and communication!

Definitely support small businesses that are great like them!

I ordered screens mid March from this company they had taken money from my accounts and i have still not been shipped my purchased product and it is mid June  i feel as though i have been scammed by the company and its reviews which it will not allow me to create.
Bought a window screen a couple years ago still in great shape. Going to order two more this week.
Great custom made products, fast shipping and good packing.
Great company and product.  I purchased retail for my home.
I LIKE how you "take care of business"! That's "SERVICE"! Thank you!!!
Woot woot!! Pleased with your product!!!
...they are trying hard I know that...
Good price and quality
Screens were awesome!!!
